column4: how do I get rid of the "beep" noise on ubuntu desktop when press "tab" key.  On the cli I use tab completion alot and it's freaking anoying to here that beep everytime I press tab
is there a way to globally turn off system sounds so I don't have to worry about it in other apps?
in the sounds, set the sound scheme to none, however sound apps and the like will make sounds, to kill those simply mute the volume as you expect
